name: Tiffany Spence
text: The food was great and so was the service. We had a large group for work and she was able to get us all situated and comfortable quickly. Our food came out quickly and she made sure every one was satisfied. Didn't come to the table too much or too little.

name: Ralph Reeves
text: I frequently travel to the Glen Allen/Richmond area for work and visited Ledo Pizza a couple of years ago for the first time. Other table-service restaurants in the area had long wait times, so I figured I'd give this place a shot since it …More

name: Usman Khan
text: Ledo's is one of my favorite pizza places of all time! Their tomato sauce has this subtle hint of sweetness that is not overbearing at all, and is actually very addicting. A plain cheese pizza is superb! Their Spicy Calamari pizza is also …More

name: Tanny Simmons
text: Man, they must be known for their pizza but we got the pasta and that was a mistake. We were in from out of town and the restaurant was right around the corner. We would have been better off going to Whole Foods for dinner. The pasta was …More

name: Sabari Karthik Saravanan
text: I ordered pizzas for my daughter's birthday party. Manager was very helpful on deciding the number of pizzas, walking through the menu and helped me in taking the right decision.

name: Daniel Michnewich
text: I grew up in Maryland eating at Ledos. I specifically came here because I love the pizza but this place is far from MD standards. The toppings looked like they were put on sparingly.  On the half of pizza I had with ham, there might have …More

name: will
text: We called ahead and we had a party of 10 for my son's birthday. Heather was our waitress and was doing everything, service was horrible but we felt sorry for her. I got up and even tried helping with refills, food came and was good. I have …More

name: Jeanine Dolan
text: NOT my favorite pizza place, but was in the area and wanted a slice...well, they don't serve by the slice. What kind of pizza place doesn't serve by the slice? Pizza was mediocre maybe other menu items are better.

name: Ahmad eddie
text: the best pizza that iv ever had , friendly staff and amazing service !!!

name: Tijuana Gholson
text: Had a wonder dining experience. Sarah was the BEST server! Thank you for great customer service Sarah!

name: Erica Whitney
text: Great pizza. My husband and I like to get our own personal pizzas which end up being enough food for at least two meals.

name: Michael McGee
text: Always good, but this time pizza was too dry.

name: Charles Arnold
text: Nice deals and food made quick. Calzone was missing ricotta?

name: Stephanie Mosby
text: Ledo's Pizza is soooo delicious!! Great service at this restaurant too.

name: Seth Wood
text: I understand now why the rating is so low. Every time I order something from here via Uber Eats, They call and tell me they don’t have it. I’m Never ordering from here again!

name: bruce vann
text: The pizza was great.  The service sucked.  I didn't come there for service though. I came to eat and wasn't disappointed.

name: tasha floyd
text: Such good pizza ! I'm  not a big thin pizza fan but this pizza has the perfect ratio .... always cooked perfectly.  Just the right amount of sauce . The pepperoni is thick cut and always tastes so fresh . Service is fast and staff is always friendly .

name: Nathan Canning
text: A MD favorite with a great take on Italian american classics.

name: Ben
text: Crust was buttery and flakey, delicious sauce, tons of toppings. The staff was delightful and the kitchen was quick. This is my new go-to when I'm in Richmond.

name: Nicky T.M.
text: Ordered online. Received an order confirmation email. Waited for an hour, no pizza appeared. When I called, an employee told me that my phone number was invalid so the order was canceled. (I went back to the order confirmation email, the …More

name: Arbalist
text: At these prices you'd think that they could bother making their own sauce, but NO. Marinara sauce was sickly sweet, I didn't try the white pizza but then again I don't think I will.

name: Wilson Melek
text: Ordered buffalo chicken sub yesterday for lunch.  Spent $9.50 it was the worst I have eaten.  Almost returned, didn’t want to waste my lunch time.

name: afroza y
text: Always welcoming...nice stuffs

name: Con Alves
text: I really like the food. The servers are so nice and on top of things. But I don't understand why there is no coffee in this place. When I finish an excellent meal, coffee is my dessert. Don't all restaurants have coffee? What a shame!

name: Michael McCray
text: Excellent food and fast service

name: Janine Gibbons
text: Years ago, I work at a Ledo's Pizza in Laurel, Maryland. It was a clean, friendly, and well run restaurant. Last night, I visited a Ledo's Pizza in Short Pump. Let me just say I will never eat there again. The place was filthy. The doors to …More

name: Shelly West
text: Restaurant was clean and waitress was friendly but unfortunately she was on her own and so the service was delayed. I felt bad for her. She was trying so hard.

name: Al Hep
text: Worst pizza ever!!! Wrong two times ... Burnt pizza the first time.   Remade extra sauce, extra cheese pizza and I got HEATED CHEESE CRACKER.  Don't deserve the one star!!!

name: Eileen Y.
text: Customer service is okay but the pizza is SO GOOD

name: Ammar Salem
text: The pizza is always hot and fresh

name: John R
text: I grew up eating Ledos at the first restaurant in College Park and have eaten at many other locations but the Glen Allen location needs corporate help. I bought a large pizza last week and it was literally paper thin. It was not even close to their famous pizza.  Please fix your pizza so its like the rest of the franchise.

name: Devin Foster
text: Best pizza in richmond. Tried the calzone today and its offical!!! Its the sauce and the flaky dough they use.

name: John Bryson
text: The pizza tasted like a barn animals. The calzone was even worse the staff put the wrong toppings inside and the staff was very rude when i asked for another one. The pizza lacked flavor and was dead. I strongly believe that Papa John's makes a much better pizza for half the price don't bother purchasing.

name: Jenny Tat
text: Take-out took 20 minutes and it wasn't even busy during the lunch hour. My Chipotle chicken sandwich only had a few scraps of chicken and the bread was dry. It was my first and last time there.

name: Reuben
text: Staff was helpful, food was great.

name: David Cavedo
text: None of the beers listed on the happy hour list were available. The Pinot grigio was served warm so we had to have the Chardonnay. I asked what IPAs were available in bottles and was told Amstel light and Stella Artois (neither of which are …More

name: Mable Brown
text: The food is so good but it's sad that the service is terrible. I use to work at a ledos back in my home town and I couldn't imagine being the type of servers that they have. I came in two weeks ago with my family and ordered two salads …More

name: Jon Hacker
text: Love this place! Great gluten free pizza!

name: DavidGotTheJuice45
text: The wait staff was horrible and one of the waitstaff. Was engaged in a argument with her boyfriend or husband. My kids was afraid

name: Dave Kolmer
text: Nice little pizza place, but a little overpriced I thought.

name: Ravi Selvam
text: Service is good as well the food. Watch your calories, you tent to eat a lot

name: Linda Lowman
text: Ordered lunch for delivery, pizza for 1 order was cold with a lot of onions but little hamburger.  2nd Order of chicken tenders and fries came with a whopping total of 7 waffle fries.  Very disappointing.  Not to mention that we were charged I think for the uber driver to deliver it which was NOT mentioned on the phone.

name: Kevin Gridley
text: Love their stromboli!

text: Excellent food, very clean

text: Everything was wro3on my order manager apologized but didn't offer any courtesy compensation

text: Pizza is hit or miss but wings are on point!
